titles.title: Protect America Long-term Extension Act
Protect America Long-term Extension Act
A bill to extend the provisions of the Protect America Act of 2007 until July 1, 2009.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 584.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary:
Protect America Long-term Extension Act - Amends the Protect America Act of 2007 to extend its authority until July 1, 2009.
States that the preceding amendment shall take effect as if enacted on February 15, 2008.
